cause.description:
[NYTimes] Find Yourself Packing It On? Blame Friends
By GINA KOLATA Published: July 26, 2007
http://www.nytimes.com/2007/07/26/health/26fat.html?_r=1&adxnnl=0&oref=slogin&adxnnlx=1185556217-TukUSO4LCH7M0AefH3kW2A&pagewanted=all
1. Obesity is an extremely contagious virus.
2. The only way to stop this virus from spreading is to have the government protect us from fat people via a large-scale quarantine.
3. http://cafehayek.typepad.com/hayek/2007/07/like-a-virus.html
cause.name: Quarantine All Fat People!
